1619730.name: RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 2nd 50
1619730.description:
Created in the spirit of early console RPGs, this pack of 50 battlers by artist Tyler Warren brings 50 more fresh options to the professional and amateur game creator. Carefully crafted in a style comparable to the immensely popular Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series, this set features monsters ranging from cute to colossal. Trolls, bugs, slimes, elementals, beasts, animals, flyers, and many others. Recently remastered for use in RPG Maker MV / MZ.

Features:

- 50 unique battlers
- Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MZ
- All 50 battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues
- Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other)
- Art style similar in spirit to the classic whimsical RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
- Recently remastered for sharper colors and better usability

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1619730.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
